settings.title: WATCH THE LIVE STREAM OF OUR DRAW HERE AT 5PM EST TODAY!
settings.subheading: GOOD LUCK FROM ALL OF MOTA TEAM!

settings.title: Welcome to Mota
settings.text:
Mota is a membership rewards club for car lovers offering discounts and savings across our retail platform, as well as giving you the opportunity to win classic and rare cars through our member giveaways. 

Our current giveaway is one of our all time favourites! A 1978 Porsche 930 Turbo. Our next giveaway is a 1967 Ford Mustang Fastback.

Mota giveaways offer our members the absolute best classics and some of the most collectible cars available. If you are a car lover, car collector, or just want a really cool car to drive to work or on weekends, then this is the membership club for you.

Purchase a single one off membership for your chance to win a particular car giveaway, or a VIP membership that accumulates your entries each month for the best chance to win in all of our giveaways. VIP Members are automatically entered into every car giveaway.

We hope you enjoy all the benefits of becoming a member.

Safe and enjoyable motoring from the Mota Team; Jordan, Jasmine, Luke, Shane + Dylan.

settings.subtitle: Our current giveaway
settings.title: 1978 Porsche 930 Turbo
settings.text:
6 cylinder | 3.3Ltr Turbo engine | Racing bucket seats | 4 speed manual gearbox | Widebody GT2 body kit | |Racing bonnet and engine clips |

Valued at $205,000!

Permit Number: TP/01963

Promotion capped at 8,000 total entrants. Draw takes place on 15/12/2022 or earlier if cap is reached. The draw is guaranteed.

The number of total entrants registered is displayed on our 'Giveaways Page' updated daily.

The draw is overseen by an external scrutineer, not affiliated with our company. The Scrutineer is qualified as a Notary Public, Justice of the Peace and is a current practicing Barrister and Solictor.

settings.title: BUY YOUR ENTRIES
settings.text: Purchase a single entry membership OR a VIP Monthly Membership to win the cars!

settings.title: SHOP AND SAVE
settings.text: Receive discounts and offers across our automotive + retail partner network. Mota gives you access to incredible savings with access to thousands of offers from Australia's most popular retailers and automative specialists, offers that are not available to the general public.

settings.title: Support the Royal Melbourne childrens hospital
settings.text: Help us continue to suport & donate to our favourite charites. Mota team has partnered with the Royal Melbourne Childrens Hosptial and is currently sponsoring a bed in their Kookaburra Ward for kids battling cancer.

settings.title: join our vip now
settings.description: The best part about becoming a VIP member is that is pays for itself, plus some... Mota gives you access to incredible savings and offers from over 4,000 Australian brands + retailers, offers and discounts that are not available to the general public. Once a VIP package is purchased, simply login as a member to access. VIP members receive entries into every single giveaway, your entries accumulate each month giving you the best chance to win!

settings.title: or GET YOUR SINGLE ENTRY Membership NOW!
settings.description: One time payment only. Giveaway Permit Number: TP/01963

settings.title: CHARITIES WE LOVE + SUPPORT
settings.text:
MOTA team couldn't be more proud to be sponsoring a bed at the Royal Melbourne Children's Hospital, in the Kookaburra Ward for children battling cancer. Mota will be sponsoring additional bed's at the Children's Hospital for every new member car giveaway we run. 

We are excited to help support in this way to the amazing work the team at the Children's Hospital are doing. They are absolute angels!

settings.subtitle: Our next Giveaway
settings.title: 1967 FORD MUSTANG fastback
settings.text: Check out our 'Future Giveaways' page for information on our next giveaway. Entry for the Mustang will open at the conculsion of our Porsche Turbo draw. All draws are streamed live on facebook and socials. Become a VIP member today to be automatically entered into every giveaway, including this Mustang Fastback, you won't miss out!
